memberdef.name: LV_THEME_LIVE_UPDATE
memberdef.initializer: 0 /*1: Allow theme switching at run time. Uses 8..10 kB of RAM*/

memberdef.name: LV_USE_THEME_DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: 1 /*Built mainly from the built-in styles. Consumes very few RAM*/

memberdef.name: LV_USE_THEME_MATERIAL
memberdef.initializer: 1 /*Flat theme with bold colors and light shadows*/

memberdef.name: LV_USE_THEME_NEMO
memberdef.initializer: 1 /*Water-like theme based on the movie "Finding Nemo"*/
